Text: While Leonardo da Vinci is best known for his beautiful works of art, he was also a great inventor, designing everything from flying machines to instruments of war. Join The Re-inventors as they attempt to build one of da Vinciâs most ambitious projects, a circular, human-powered, 20-foot wide wooden tank. Could this innovative design have changed the course of military history or will Matt and Jeremy discover that this massive machine is not as scary as it looks?
